alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 12:59AM MST until February 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
